name: Oh YA Sauce YA
description: Oh Ya Sauce Ya just got out of a nasty breakup with his supermodel/humanitarian partner and flees from the sights and eyes of the world to a deep and dark place where no one has ever gone. A planet fitness near in Portland, Maine. There he will devote every waking second of his existence to perfecting Bulgarian split squats and push ups. During his time of solitary confinement, Oh Ya Sauce Ya hopes to overcome the biggest obstacle of his life... A Broken Heart!
